lines.text: When I was born the doctor said, "Boil some water," and I've been in it ever since.

[running into Sergeant Danzig]
Oh, Arsenic and Old Face.

[to Sergeant Danzig]
A zebra's covered with stripes too, but underneath he's still a jackass.
Connie, it may not show but I'm yellow.

[after seeing Big 7-foot Sailor]
How'd he get in the navy?
He must've lied about his height.
You're Bullet Bradley's manager. I saw the fight on television over at my sister-in-law's. She has a 16-inch screen.

[to Connie]
Come out from behind there, Spongecake, and I'll buy you a little drink or a chinchilla coat... something that will cover you from your chin to your chilla.
